title: Google\Cloud\DocumentAI\V1\Document\Page\Matrix
name: Matrix
description:
Representation for transformation matrix, intended to be compatible and used with OpenCV format for image manipulation.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.documentai.v1.Document.Page.Matrix

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.type
params.description: This encodes information about what data type the matrix uses. For example, 0 (CV_8U) is an unsigned 8-bit image. For the full list of OpenCV primitive data types, please refer to https://docs.opencv.org/4.3.0/d1/d1b/group__core__hal__interface.html
